name: KALA (Anoman Studio)
description:
Kala is a turn-based role-playing game played from a third-person perspective, using 3D Stylized Art and Quick Time Event battle system. 

The main objective is to help the solo detective who possessed mystical power to uncover the biggest mystical case, by defeating various enemies throughout the campaign.

Currently on a Pre - Alpha Version. Feel free to give us your feedback in twitter  or comment down below.

Update v.03:

  1. Implement effect, timing combo, camera, trigger to enemy
  2. New Animation 
  3. UI update
